original_title: 竹下パフォーマンス 2 ゴジラ対水戸黄門
overview: The second student film made by Shinya Takeshita at the Osaka University of Arts. This serves as a Godzilla fan film where Takeshita reuses his concept from his previous short, and portrays every character as an homage to classic kaiju egia as well as the jidaigeki drama series.
title: Takeshita Performance 2: Godzilla vs Mito Komon
